name: The Niland Incident
description:
A massive earthquake hits the California desert, damaging the nuclear reactor in a secret underground government facility near the Salton Sea. You are hired to enter the facility, and reach the reactor core on the 17th floor before it explodes. 

No one knows exactly what the facility was used for, but all its staff are now dead, and there are unspeakable horrors within its corridors. 

You will have to increase your abilities by slaying foes and collecting powerups in order to reach your goal in this retro themed Roguelike RPG.

Controls: WASD to move and attack, E to exit level (when prompted), Enter to advance story (when prompted).
